title: European AI Ethics Guidelines
description: Comprehensive guidelines for ethical AI development and deployment across European institutions.
authors: European Commission AI Ethics Expert Group

title: EuroLLM: A European Large Language Model Dataset
description: Multilingual dataset for training large language models with European language diversity and cultural context.

title: GenAI Benchmark Suite for European Languages
description: Comprehensive benchmarking tools for evaluating generative AI models on European language tasks.

title: Towards Trustworthy AI: European Perspectives
description: Research paper analyzing approaches to building trustworthy AI systems from a European regulatory perspective.

title: Federated Learning Framework for European Healthcare
description: Open-source framework enabling privacy-preserving machine learning across European healthcare institutions.

title: European GenAI Research Survey 2024
description: Annual survey of generative AI research activities, funding, and achievements across European institutions.
